abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column on Brian Williams' latest venture, Rock Center With Brian Williams, which NBC, owned by Comcast, hopes one day will be a competitor to CBS program 60 Minutes; says charisma of Williams will go a long way in making success out of what is a smart but not sure bet for Comcast.
snippet: With “Rock Center With Brian Williams,” Mr. Williams will try to spread his broadcast charisma over a newsmagazine show, a TV platform with a history of abundant carnage.
lead_paragraph: With “Rock Center With Brian Williams,” Mr. Williams will try to spread his broadcast charisma over a newsmagazine show, a TV platform with a history of abundant carnage.

headline.seo: Brian Williams Adds Newsmagazine to His Portfolio
